0.1.name: wordpress/wp-advanced-trac
0.1.description:
Advanced version of the Wp-trac plugin http://www.johnciacia.com/wp-trac/ with some new features, code fixes. First of all, it was developed to show roadmaps of your projects to other users.

Main changes between original version: * Project end date is not required; * Use in [wptrac project_id_number ] in your posts,pages to show project roadmap to your users, for example [wptrac 1]; * The last date of the current tasks is shown as possible release date; * Future tasks are not displayed to users.

Example and plugin roadmap is here http://eeexception.org/my-projects/wp-advanced-trac/
